prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with spiky fur and a bright yellow color scheme.
I want a cute yet fierce Pokemon that looks like a small, furry creature with electric powers.
Generate a Pokemon design that embodies speed and agility with lightning bolt motifs.
Make a dynamic Pokemon that can harness electricity and has a playful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sleek body and electrifying features, perfect for battles.
Design a vibrant yellow Pokemon with sharp, spiky features and a friendly demeanor.
Give me a Pokemon that represents the essence of electricity with striking visual traits.
